<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:00.92%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:08.32%;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Forward-Looking Statements

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

All statements other than statements of historical facts contained in this Annual Report on Form 10-K, including statements regarding our strategy, future operations, future financial position, future revenue, projected costs, prospects, plans, objectives of management and expected market growth, are forward-looking statements. These statements involve known and unknown risks, uncertainties and other important factors that may cause our actual results, performance or achievements to be materially different from any future results, performance or achievements expressed or implied by the forward-looking statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">

	The words &#x201C;anticipate,&#x201D; &#x201C;believe,&#x201D; &#x201C;estimate,&#x201D; &#x201C;expect,&#x201D; &#x201C;intend,&#x201D; &#x201C;may,&#x201D; &#x201C;plan,&#x201D; &#x201C;predict,&#x201D; &#x201C;project,&#x201D; &#x201C;target,&#x201D; &#x201C;potential,&#x201D; &#x201C;will,&#x201D; &#x201C;would,&#x201D; &#x201C;could,&#x201D; &#x201C;should,&#x201D; &#x201C;continue,&#x201D; and similar expressions are intended to identify forward-looking statements, although not all forward-looking statements contain these identifying words. <DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	3

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage4"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<EFX_PART_I>
<A NAME="FIS_PART_I"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	PART
</FONT>
<A NAME="VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_PARTI_404094">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	I
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	ITEM&nbsp;1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2003;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2003;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2003;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	BUSINESS
</FONT>
<A NAME="VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM1BUSINESS_165366">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	We are a clinical-stage gene therapy company focused on developing life-changing treatments for patients suffering from severe diseases of the central nervous system, or CNS. We focus on CNS diseases where we believe that an adeno-associated virus, or AAV, gene therapy approach that either increases or decreases the production of a specific protein can slow or reduce the symptoms experienced by patients, and therefore have a clinically meaningful impact. We have created a product engine that enables us to engineer, optimize, manufacture and deliver our AAV-based therapies that have the potential to provide durable efficacy following a single administration directly to the CNS. Our product engine has rapidly generated programs for five CNS indications, including advanced Parkinson's disease; a monogenic form of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, or a form of the disease caused by a single gene mutation; Friedreich's ataxia; Huntington's disease; and spinal muscular atrophy. Our most advanced clinical candidate, VY-AADC01, is being evaluated for the treatment of advanced Parkinson's disease in an open-label, Phase&nbsp;1b clinical trial with the goal of generating human proof-of-concept data in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	of 2016. Our founders and members of our management team have extensive experience in drug discovery and development and have pioneered significant advances within the fields of AAV gene therapy and neuroscience.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	We believe that AAV gene therapy is a particularly attractive treatment approach for CNS diseases that are caused by well-defined genetic mutations. CNS diseases are a leading driver of global disease burden and represent the single largest biopharmaceutical market with estimated worldwide annual sa
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	les of over $125&nbsp;billion in 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	, with the five CNS indications that we are currently targeting representing only a portion of this market. Due to the limited treatment options available for many CNS diseases, there remains a significant unmet medical need and an opportunity for AAV gene therapy to transform the lives of many patients with severe CNS diseases. Based upon clinical data generated to date, we believe that durable gene expression is achievable following a single administration of AAV gene therapy. Recent advances in delivery techniques allow for targeted delivery of AAV vectors, which are modified, non-replicating versions of AAV, to discrete regions of the CNS. In addition, AAV is believed to be safe, as no vector-related serious adverse events, or SAEs, have been reported in the more than 1,300 patients that we estimate have been treated with AAV gene therapy to date, including 200 patients treated for CNS indications.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	We have built a product engine that we believe positions us to be the leading company at the intersection of AAV gene therapy and severe CNS diseases. Our team of experts in the fields of AAV gene therapy and neuroscience first identifies and selects severe CNS diseases that are well-suited for treatment using AAV gene therapy. We then engineer and optimize AAV vectors for delivery to the targeted tissue or cells. Our manufacturing process employs an established system to enable production of high quality AAV vectors at commercial-scale. Finally, we leverage established routes of administration and advances in dosing techniques to optimize delivery of our AAV gene therapies directly to discrete regions of the brain or more broadly to the spinal cord region.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our most advanced clinical candidate, VY-AADC01, is being evaluated for the treatment of advanced Parkinson's disease. The overall goal of treatment with VY-AADC01 is to restore advanced Parkinson's disease patients' responsiveness to levodopa, or L-Dopa, the longtime standard of care for controlling patients' symptoms at early stages of the disease. Human proof-of-concept data is being generated for VY-AADC01 in an open-label, Phase&nbsp;1b clinical trial being conducted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	at two sites in the United States,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the University of California, San Francisco, or UCSF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the initial trial site, and University of Pittsburgh, or UPMC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The main goals of this dose-escalation trial are to optimize vector delivery and dose, as well as to obtain further information on the safety profile of the treatment. Enrollment in the Phase&nbsp;1b clinical trial is ongoing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	with the goal of generating human
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	proof-of-concept data in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fourth quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our four preclinical programs target severe CNS indications where loss or abnormal expression of a specific gene has been identified as the cause of the disease. Furthermore, based on preclinical data, we believe that we can successfully deliver the target gene to the appropriate tissue and cells in the CNS in order to increase or decrease expression of the target protein, as required for therapeutic efficacy. Several of our product candidates may be eligible for orphan drug designation or breakthrough therapy designation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage5"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	In February 2015, we entered into a strategic collaboration with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Sanofi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Genzyme, or Genzyme, to leverage our combined expertise and assets to develop AAV gene therapies for severe CNS diseases. Under the agreement, we received $65.0&nbsp;million in upfront cash, a $30.0&nbsp;million upfront equity investment and an in-kind commitment of $5.0 million, totaling $100 million. Additionally, we are eligible to receive up to $745&nbsp;million in option and milestone payments while retaining U.S. commercial rights to most programs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Our pipeline of AAV gene therapy programs is summarized in the table below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/17/0001558370-16-004222_VYGR20151231X10K001.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.586377IN; HEIGHT: 4.322917IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 5PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mission and Strategy
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 5PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Our mission is to become the world leader in AAV gene therapy for treating severe CNS diseases by developing transformative therapies. Our strategy to achieve this mission is to:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Continually invest in our AAV product engine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	We intend to further develop and enhance our product engine by focusing on (i)&nbsp;vector engineering and optimization; (ii)&nbsp;manufacturing; and (iii)&nbsp;dosing and delivery techniques. We plan to continue generating novel AAV vectors by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	engineering and optimizing vectors best suited to a targeted disease. We are building an onsite, state-of-the-art process research and development facility to enable the manufacturing of high quality AAV gene therapies. We expect to utilize established and novel techniques for dosing and delivery of our AAV gene therapies to the CNS. We plan to continually invest in our product engine to maintain our leadership in AAV gene therapy for CNS diseases.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Establish a leadership position in commercial-scale, high quality AAV manufacturing.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe that manufacturing capacity and expertise are critical to successfully treating patients using gene therapy, and we are committed to building a system with commercial capacity. Through our collaboration with MassBiologics, a U.S. Food and Drug Administration, or FDA, licensed manufacturer affiliated with the University of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage6"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	Massachusetts Medical School, we are establishing a commercial-scale current good manufacturing practice, or cGMP, compliant manufacturing capability. We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	initiated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	cGMP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	production activities at MassBiologics earlier this year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	. We are using the baculovirus AAV production system, a technology for producing AAV vectors at scale in insect-derived cells, originally invented and developed by several members of our current production team while at the National Institutes of Health, or NIH, which we continue to improve upon. We believe that having oversight over our own commercial manufacturing process is critical to ensuring quality product with commercial yields.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Optimize and advance VY-AADC01 for the treatment of advanced Parkinson's disease.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Human proof-of-concept data is being generated for VY-AADC01 in an open-label, Phase&nbsp;1b dose-escalation trial being conducted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	at two sites in the United States,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	UCSF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	, the initial trial site, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	UPMC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	. Enrollment in the Phase&nbsp;1b clinical trial is ongoing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	. As of October 2015, we disclosed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	eight patients
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	had been treated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	, including five patients in the first cohort and three patients in the second cohort. In the second cohort, we increased the infusion volume to improve the coverage level achieved. The main goals of this trial are to optimize vector delivery and dosing, as well as to obtain further information on the safety profile of the treatment. More specifically, we are seeking to identify the infusion volume required to achieve ef
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	fective coverage of the putamen, particularly the posterior putamen,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	the targeted region within the brain. Once we optimize for coverage, we expect to escalate the dose of VY-AADC01 to optimize for clinical benefit.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Continue to build a pipeline of gene therapy programs focused on severe CNS diseases.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Beyond our clinical-stage program for advanced Parkinson's disease, we have a deep and promising pipeline of AAV gene therapy programs in various stages of preclinical development. Our goal is to add at least one new pipeline program in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	the second quarter of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016 and submit an Investigational New Drug Application, or IND, for one of our existing preclinical programs in 2017. We believe that our leadership position in AAV gene therapy for CNS diseases and our product engine provide us with the necessary capabilities to evaluate and capitalize on external opportunities. As such, we plan to opportunistically expand our pipeline through acquisition, in-licensing or other strategic transactions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Maintain and maximize the value of our commercialization rights.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Under our collaboration with Genzyme, we have retained significant commercialization rights. As we advance clinical development of our product candidates and programs, we expect to continue to explore value-maximizing avenues, including building our own sales and marketing infrastructure or partnering with third parties, for commercialization.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Continue to expand our intellectual property portfolio.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;We seek to have an industry leading intellectual property portfolio. To that end, we seek patent rights for various aspects of our programs, including vector engineering and construct design, our production process, and all features of our clinical products including compositions and methods of delivery. We expect to continue to expand our intellectual property portfolio by aggressively seeking patent rights for promising aspects of our product engine and product candidates.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 5PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AAV Gene Therapy for CNS Diseases
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Gene therapy is an approach whereby gene expression is directly altered in patients to address the underlying cause or predominant manifestations of disease. We believe that the targeted nature of gene therapy may enable powerful treatment options, and provide these patients with meaningful and durable benefits.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	While AAV gene therapy can potentially be harnessed for multiple treatment methods, we are currently focused on gene replacement and gene knockdown approaches. Gene replacement is intended to restore the expression of a protein that is not expressed, expressed at abnormally low levels or functionally mutated with loss of function. Gene knockdown is intended to reduce the expression of a pathologically mutated protein that has detrimental effects.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_DQ47801_OVERVIEW_OF_AAV-BASED_THERAPEU__">
</A>
<A NAME="VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC_DQ47801_2">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Overview of AAV-Based Therapeutic Methods Currently Being Pursued by Voyager
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/17/0001558370-16-004222_VYGR20151231X10K002.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.661184IN; HEIGHT: 2.8125IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Our gene therapy approach uses AAV vectors which we believe are ideal vectors for gene therapy for several reasons:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Broad Applicability.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AAV is able to transduce, or transfer a therapeutic gene, into numerous cell types including target cells in the CNS.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Safety.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AAV is believed to be safe and is not known to cause any disease in humans. No vector-related SAEs have been reported in the more than 1,300 patients, including over 200 patients for CNS indications, treated with AAV gene therapy to date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Does Not Readily Integrate.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;AAV does not readily integrate into the genome of the target cell, reducing the potential for oncogenesis, or the induction of cancer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	There are several important reasons why we believe that CNS diseases are well-suited for treatment with AAV gene therapy, including the following:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Validated Targets.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Many CNS diseases are caused by well-defined mutations in genes and these genes represent genetically validated drug targets for AAV gene therapy.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Targeted Delivery.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Advances in delivery techniques allow for direct delivery of AAV vectors to discrete regions in the brain or broader delivery throughout the spinal cord via the cerebrospinal fluid, or CSF.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Durable Expression.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Long-term gene expression may be achievable in the CNS following one-time dosing and transfer of the therapeutic gene with an AAV vector. Cells in the CNS are terminally differentiated, or no longer divide, eliminating the potential for cell division to dilute expression of the therapeutic gene. Repeated or continual dosing with direct injection of drugs into the CNS is complex, therefore a one-time AAV gene therapy has significant advantages.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Immune Privileged Site.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;There is a reduced risk of harmful immune response due to localized delivery in a self-contained system.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	While we are currently focused on gene replacement and gene knockdown approaches, we are also actively exploring additional potential treatment methods that can utilize an AAV vector, including the direct delivery of monoclonal antibodies to the CNS, as well as gene editing to correct or delete a gene in the cell genome.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 5PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	The Voyager Product Engine
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	We have built a product engine that we believe positions us to be the leading company at the intersection of AAV gene therapy and severe CNS diseases. Our team of experts in the fields of AAV gene therapy and neuroscience first identifies and selects severe CNS diseases that are well-suited for treatment using AAV gene therapy. We then apply our expertise in AAV vector engineering and optimization, process research and development, manufacturing, dosing and direct CNS delivery to generate a specific AAV gene therapy for a target disease. We believe that optimizing each of these parameters is a key factor for overall program success. We expect that our current and future pipeline programs will make use of technological advances generated with our product engine.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 5PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Disease Selection
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	We assess potential product programs based upon the following criteria:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Unmet Need.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;There is a significant unmet medical need for the indication and substantial commercial potential.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Target Validation.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;There is strong evidence that expression of a specific gene, or lack thereof, is causing, or critical to, the disease state.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Delivery Using AAV.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;There is strong evidence supporting the ability to target the relevant tissue and cells using an AAV vector to achieve sufficient target gene expression.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Clinical Readouts.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;The clinical impact of an AAV gene therapy can be clearly measured, including through well-accepted clinical endpoints and the use of both existing and novel biomarkers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Scalability of Manufacturing.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Sufficient AAV vector to supply late-stage clinical development and commercialization can be manufactured.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	In addition to the criteria above, we also look for groups of diseases where our knowledge can be transferred. For instance, we believe that some of the delivery parameters and imaging techniques that are employed in our VY-AADC01 program can be applied to AAV gene therapy delivery for Huntington's disease or other diseases where direct, targeted delivery to the brain is warranted. Likewise, we anticipate that our programs for a monogenic form of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, or ALS, Friedreich's ataxia and spinal muscular atrophy, or SMA, will all utilize injection into the CSF within the spinal column to achieve broad transgene expression in and around the spinal cord.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Vector Engineering&nbsp;and Optimization
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We are engineering and optimizing AAV vectors that we believe are best suited for each of our programs. The key components of an AAV vector include: (i)&nbsp;the capsid, or the outer viral protein shell that encloses the target DNA, which includes the promoter and the therapeutic gene; (ii)&nbsp;the therapeutic gene, or transgene; and (iii)&nbsp;the promoter, or the DNA sequence that drives the expression of the transgene.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Members of our team have co-discovered many of the known naturally occurring AAV capsids and have also created promising genetically engineered AAV capsids. Genetically engineered capsids have yielded vectors with desirable properties, such as higher biological potency and enhanced tissue specificity. We believe that there is an opportunity to further optimize AAV capsids to confer desired characteristics relating to properties such as tissue specificity and immunogenicity. We have a significant effort dedicated to designing and screening for novel AAV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage9"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	capsids using a number of different scientific approaches. We believe that the information generated by this work will enhance our ability to rationally design AAV capsids with specific properties for particular therapeutic applications.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We completed a non-human primate study that directly compared transgene expression and distribution in the spinal cord across seven different AAV capsids. The capsids were delivered via injection into the CSF within the spinal column and the specific transgene delivered by all the capsids was FXN. Levels of FXN expression were measured at multiple regions of the spinal cord, including the cervical, thoracic and lumbar regions. As shown in the figure below, meaningful differences in the level and distribution of FXN expression were seen across the AAV capsids that were compared. In this study, the levels of FXN expression were highest with AAV2, AAV5 and AAVDJ, and lowest with AAV9. Additionally, FXN expression was normalized as a fold increase relative to FXN expression in a human brain reference sample. Fold increase is a measure describing how much a quantity increases from a baseline value to a final value. For example, a baseline value of 30 and a final value of 60 corresponds to a fold change of two, or a two-fold increase. Fold increase is used as a reporting measure to emphasize the increase itself as opposed to the absolute values.
</FONT>
<A NAME="VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_DR47801_CAPSID_COMPARISON_STUDY_SHOWED__">
</A>
<A NAME="VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC_DR47801_1">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	apsid Comparison Study Showed Substantial Differences in Transgene Expression
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	of the Spinal Cord of Non-Human Primates
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/17/0001558370-16-004222_VYGR20151231X10K003.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.568954IN; HEIGHT: 3.875IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	With respect to the target DNA delivered through AAV gene therapy, we are selecting promoters that we believe have the appropriate activity and tissue selectively for our specific gene therapy programs. We are also designing transgenes to provide optimal expression once delivered to the targeted cells.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 5PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Manufacturing at Commercial Quality&nbsp;and Scale
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	The ability to produce high quality AAV vectors at commercial-scale is a critical success factor in AAV gene therapy. While at the NIH,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	m
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	embers of our current production team invented and developed a baculovirus AAV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage10"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	production system, which we use and have continued to improve. This system has a number of attributes that enable high quality commercial-scale manufacturing, including:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	High Yield.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;A single manufacturing run at 500-liter scale can yield many thousands of doses of an AAV gene therapy.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	High Purity.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;A relatively high percentage of AAV vectors contain the therapeutic DNA, reducing the number of empty capsids compared to alternative manufacturing approaches. In addition, the baculovirus system eliminates the risk of introducing mammalian cell derived impurities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Scalability.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;This process is reproducible at volumes ranging from 0.02 liters to 500 liters.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Promising Regulatory Framework.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Although to date no gene therapy product has been approved in the United States, products manufactured with the baculovirus system include the AAV gene therapy, Glybera, which is approved in Europe, and the marketed vaccines Flublok and Cervarix.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	We are building a state-of-the-art process research and development production facility for manufacturing research-grade AAV vectors onsite at our Cambridge, Massachusetts headquarters and a cGMP, commercial-scale AAV manufacturing capability through our collaboration with MassBiologics, in Fall River, Massachusetts, both of which will employ our baculovirus production system.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 5PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Optimized Delivery&nbsp;and Route of Administration
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Identifying the optimal route of administration and delivery parameters for AAV gene therapy, such as infusion volume, flow rate, vector concentration and dose and formulation for a specific disease, are critical to achieving safe and effective levels of transgene expression in the targeted location in the CNS. We aim to develop clinically feasible protocols that yield reproducible results across patients. For our current pipeline programs, we are either pursuing direct injection into the brain, called intraparenchymal injection (advanced Parkinson's disease and Huntington's disease) or injection into the CSF within the cerebrospinal space, called intrathecal injection (Friedreich's ataxia, SMA and a monogenic form of ALS).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Intraparenchymal Injection to the Brain.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;In the development of VY-AADC01 for the treatment of advanced Parkinson's disease, we are using the ClearPoint System to provide real-time, intra-operative, magnetic resonance imaging, or MRI, as well as state-of-the-art infusion technologies. The ClearPoint System assists the physician in visualizing the delivery of VY-AADC01 to the putamen and to avoid specific blood vessels during the surgical procedure, with the goal of reducing the risk of hemorrhages. The surgical approach that we are using is similar to the approach used for deep brain stimulation, or DBS, a marketed device-based treatment for advanced Parkinson's disease. In multiple clinical trials to date, a similar delivery technique was used to successfully deliver AAV gene therapy to the brains of patients with Parkinson's disease. We believe that the delivery knowledge gained from our VY-AADC01 program can be applied to AAV gene therapy delivery for Huntington's disease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A NAME="VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_DR47801_OVERVIEW_OF_INTRAPARENCHYMAL_DEL">
</A>
<A NAME="VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC_DR47801_2">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage11"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Overview of Intraparenchymal Delivery
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/17/0001558370-16-004222_VYGR20151231X10K004.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.028302IN; HEIGHT: 2.486194IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT;">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-WIDTH:0;WIDTH:100%;HEIGHT:2PT;COLOR:BLACK;BACKGROUND-COLOR:BLACK;" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 7PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:7.5PT;">
	Courtesy of: Okinawa Institute of Science and Technology.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Intrathecal Injection to the Spinal Cord.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;For spinal cord disorders, including monogenic ALS, Friedreich's ataxia and SMA, we believe that intrathecal injection is the optimal route of administration to achieve broad transgene expression throughout the relevant cells in the spinal cord and sensory pathways. Preclinical studies completed by us and others have demonstrated that intrathecal delivery of AAV vectors can effectively transfer the therapeutic genes to relevant cells in all regions of the spinal cord, as well as in the sensory pathways. Currently, intrathecal injection is commonly used for the delivery of various types of medications, including those to treat pain and infections.
</FONT>
<A NAME="VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_DR47801_OVERVIEW_OF_INTRATHECAL_DELIVERY">
</A>
<A NAME="VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC_DR47801_3">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Overview of Intrathecal Delivery
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/17/0001558370-16-004222_VYGR20151231X10K005.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 4.28125IN; HEIGHT: 2.854167IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 5PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage12"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 5PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Overview of Our Pipeline
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	We have leveraged our product engine to assemble a pipeline of novel AAV gene therapies for the treatment of severe CNS diseases with high unmet medical need. Depending on the disease, our current AAV gene therapies will use either a gene replacement or gene knockdown approach. Our goal is to address the underlying cause or the predominant manifestations of a specific disease by significantly increasing or decreasing expression of the relevant proteins at targeted sites within the CNS. Several of our product candidates may be eligible for orphan drug designation or breakthrough therapy designation.
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_2"></A>

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:05.25PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:04.15PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:98.10PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	SMA
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.45PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:04.15PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:30.25PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	SMN1
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.45PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:04.15PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;

</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:67.50PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Gene replacement
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:06.45PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:186.50PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Intrathecal injection
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 5PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Advanced Parkinson's Disease Program: VY-AADC01
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 5PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT: -10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Disease Overview
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	Parkinson's disease is a progressive and debilitating adult-onset neurodegenerative disorder. Individuals who develop the disease are on average over 60&nbsp;years of age. The cardinal clinical features of Parkinson's disease include bradykinesia, or slow movements, rigidity, rest tremor and loss of balance. While the underlying cause of Parkinson's disease is unknown, the depletion of the neurotransmitter dopamine in the region of the brain called the putamen leads to the debilitating motor symptoms associated with the disease. The prevalence of Parkinson's disease is estimated to be 700,000 patients in the United States and 7 to 10&nbsp;million patients worldwide according to a 2010 article from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Neuroepidemiology
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	and the Parkinson's Disease Foundation, respectively. Due to the aging of the population in the developed world, we believe that the prevalence of Parkinson's disease will increase. It is estimated that up to 15% of the prevalent population with Parkinson's disease, or approximately 100,000 patients in the United States, have motor fluctuations that are refractory, or not well-controlled, with L-Dopa, the current mainstay of therapy, and thus may be candidates for gene therapy. These are typically patients who have progressed to an advanced stage of the disease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	The progressive motor symptoms of Parkinson's disease are due to the death of neurons in the substantia nigra region of the brain. Neurons in the substantia nigra express the enzyme aromatic L-amino acid decarboxylase, or AADC, which is responsible for the conversion of L-Dopa into dopamine, and are also responsible for the release of dopamine into the putamen, particularly the posterior putamen, which is a region of the brain that plays a significant role in motor function and control. While Parkinson's disease causes neurons in the substantia nigra to die, the neurons in the putamen remain intact, but do not normally express AADC. We believe that an AAV gene therapy approach that allows for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage13"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	delivery of AADC directly to the neurons in the putamen, enabling the targeted neurons to convert L-Dopa into dopamine, is an attractive therapeutic strategy for advanced Parkinson's disease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	While symptomatic treatments exist, there are currently no therapies that effectively slow or reverse the progression of Parkinson's disease. The beneficial effects of L-Dopa on the symptoms of Parkinson's disease were discovered over 50&nbsp;years ago and treatment with L-Dopa remains the standard of care for patients today. In the first several years after patients' diagnosis, sometimes referred to as the honeymoon period, patients' motor symptoms are generally well-controlled with L-Dopa treatment. However, as the disease progresses, patients become less responsive to L-Dopa. Despite increases in the amount and frequency of dosing of L-Dopa, patients with advanced forms of the disease experience longer periods o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	f reduced mobility, termed off-t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	ime, when their medication is ineffective, increased episodes of dyskinesias, or involuntary muscle movements, due to too much drug and shorter periods of on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	time when their medication is effective. These motor fluctuatio
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	ns and increased periods of off-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	time are associated with disability and a dramatically reduced quality of life. A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	s shown in the figure below, on-time decreases, while off-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	time and dyskinesias increase as patients progress from the honeymoon period into later stages of Parkinson's disease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Overview of Progression of Parkinson's Disease (PD)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/17/0001558370-16-004222_VYGR20151231X10K006.JPG" STYLE="WIDTH: 6.0625IN; HEIGHT: 3.666667IN" ALT="GRAPHIC">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	While L-Dopa and other pharmacological approaches to augmenting dopamine provide symptomatic benefit during early stages of Parkinson's disease, there are relatively limited treatment options for patients with advanced Parkinson's disease. There are two FDA approved therapies used to specifically treat advanced Parkinson's disease patients with medically refractive motor fluctuations. The first, DBS, requires the implantation of an electrical stimulation device in the body, which is connected to electrodes that are placed into the brain. The second, marketed as DUODOPA in Europe and DUOPA in the United States, requires the surgical placement of a tube into the intestine so that medication is delivered by a pump that resides outside the body, which patients must carry with them.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
