<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7. Commitments and Contingencies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Operating Leases
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During March 2014, the Company entered into an agreement to lease its facility under a non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;cancelable operating lease that expires December&nbsp;15, 2019. The lease includes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	renewal options, each for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	five
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year terms and at fair market value upon exercise. The lease contains escalating rent clauses which require higher rent payments in future years. The Company expenses rent on a straight
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;line basis over the term of the lease, including any rent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;free periods.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company received a leasehold improvement incentive from the landlord totaling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1,250,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. The Company recorded these incentives as a component of deferred rent and will amortize these incentives as a reduction of rent expense over the life of the lease. These leasehold improvements hav
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	e been recorded as fixed assets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In J
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	anuary 2016, the Company executed an amendment to extend the lease to December 2024 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	an agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to lease an additional facility for approximately 26,000 square feet in Cambridge, Massachusetts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. The additional facility will include laboratory and office space, and is projected to be ready for occupancy in early 2017.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	table
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	excludes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	estimated payments of approximately $25.0 million, related to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	amendment extending the 75 Sidney Street lease to December 2024
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	new lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for approximately 26,000 square feet
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in Cambridge, Massach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	usetts to December 2024
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Significant Agreements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Genzyme Collaboration Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Summary of Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In February 2015, the Company entered into an agreement with Genzyme (&#x201C;Collaboration Agreement&#x201D;), which included a non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;refundable upfront payment of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$65.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million. In addition, contemporaneous with entering into the Collaboration Agreement, Genzyme entered into a Series&nbsp;B Stock Purchase Agreement, under which Genzyme purchased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	10,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$30.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million. The fair value of the Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock at the time of issuance was approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$25.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$5.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million premium over the fair value is accounted for as additional consideration under the Collaboration Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Under the Collaboration Agreement, the Company granted Genzyme an exclusive option to license, develop and commercialize (i)&nbsp;ex
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;U.S. rights to the following programs, which are referred to as Split Territory Programs; VY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;AADC01 (&#x201C;Parkinson&#x2019;s Program&#x201D;), VY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;FXN01 (&#x201C;Friedreich&#x2019;s Ataxia Program&#x201D;), a future program to be designated by Genzyme (&#x201C;Future Program&#x201D;) and VY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;HTT01 (&#x201C;Huntington&#x2019;s Program&#x201D;) with an incremental option to co
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;commercialize VY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;HTT01 in the United States and (ii)&nbsp;worldwide rights to VY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;SMN101 (&#x201C;Spinal Muscular Atrophy Program&#x201D;). Genzyme&#x2019;s option for the Split Territory Programs and the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Program is triggered following the completion of the first proof
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;principle human clinical study (&#x201C;POP Study&#x201D;), on a program by program basis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Prior to any option exercise by Genzyme, the Company will collaborate with Genzyme in the development of products under each Split Territory Program and VY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;SMN101 pursuant to a written development plan and under the guidance of an Alliance Joint Steering Committee (&#x201C;AJSC&#x201D;), comprised of an equal number of employees from the Company and Genzyme.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company is required to use commercially reasonable efforts to develop products under each Split Territory Program and the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Program through the completion of the applicable POP Study. During the development of these joint programs, the activities are guided by a Development Advisory Committee (&#x201C;DAC&#x201D;). The DAC may elect to utilize certain Genzyme technology relating to the VY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;AADC01 Program, the VY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;HTT01 Program or generally with the manufacture of Split Territory Program products.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company is solely responsible for all costs incurred in connection with the development of the Split Territory Programs and the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Program products prior to the exercise of an option by Genzyme
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage127"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	with the exception of the following: (i)&nbsp;at the Company&#x2019;s request and upon mutual agreement, Genzyme will provide &#x201C;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;kind&#x201D; services valued at up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$5.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and (ii)&nbsp;Genzyme shall be responsible for the costs and expenses of activities under the Huntington&#x2019;s Program development plan to the extent such activities are covered by financial support Genzyme is entitled to receive from a patient advocacy group, collectively Genzyme &#x201C;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;kind&#x201D; and other funding.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Other than the Parkinson&#x2019;s Program (for which a POP Study has already been commenced), if the Company does not initiate a POP Study for a given Split Territory Program by December&nbsp;31, 2026 (or for the Future Program by the tenth anniversary of the date the Future Program is nominated by Genzyme), and Genzyme has not terminated the Collaboration Agreement with respect to the collaboration program, then Genzyme shall be entitled, as its sole and exclusive remedy, to a credit of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$10.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for each such program against other milestone or royalty payments payable by Genzyme under the Collaboration Agreement. However, if the POP Study is not initiated due to a regulatory delay or a force majeure event, such time period shall be extended for so long as such delay continues.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	With the exception of the Parkinson&#x2019;s Program, Genzyme is required to pay an option exercise payment of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$20.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$30.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million for each Split Territory Program, as well as the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Program.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Upon Genzyme&#x2019;s exercise of its option to license a given product in a Split Territory Program (&#x201C;Split Territory Licensed Product&#x201D;), the Company will have sole responsibility for the development of such Split Territory Licensed Product in the United States and Genzyme shall have sole responsibility for development of such Split Territory Licensed Product in the rest of the world. The Company and Genzyme will have shared responsibility for execution of ongoing development of such Split Territory Licensed Product that is not specific to either territory, including costs associated therewith. The Company is responsible for all commercialization activities relating to Split Territory Licensed Products in the United States, including all of the associated costs. Genzyme is responsible for all commercialization activities relating to the Split Territory Licensed Products in the rest of the world, including all of the associated costs. If Genzyme exercised its co
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;commercialization rights, Genzyme will be the lead party responsible for all commercialization activities related to Huntington&#x2019;s Licensed Product in the United States.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Upon exercise of the option, Genzyme shall have the sole right to develop the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Product worldwide. Genzyme shall be responsible for all of the development costs that occur after the option exercise date for the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Program. Genzyme is also responsible for commercialization activities relating to the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Product worldwide.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Genzyme is required to pay the Company for specified regulatory and commercial milestones, if achieved, up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$645
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million across all programs. The regulatory approval milestones are payable upon either regulatory approval in the United States or regulatory and reimbursement approval in the European Union and range from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$40.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$50.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million per milestone, with an aggregate total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$265
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million. The commercial milestones are payable upon achievement of specified annual net sales in each program and range from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$50.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$100
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million per milestone, with an aggregate total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$380
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In addition, to the extent any Split Territory Licensed Products or the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Licensed Product are commercialized, the Company is entitled to tiered royalty payments ranging from the mid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;single digits to mid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;teens based on a percentage of net sales by Genzyme. Genzyme is entitled to receive tiered royalty payments related to sales of Split Territory Licensed Product ranging from the low
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;single digits to mid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;single digits based on a percentage of net sales by the Company depending on whether the Company uses Genzyme technology in the Split Territory Licensed Product. If Genzyme elects to co
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;commercialize VY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;HTT01 in the United States, the Company and Genzyme will share in any profits or losses from VY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;HTT01 product sales.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Collaboration Agreement will continue in effect until the later of (i)&nbsp;the expiration of the last to expire of the option rights and (ii)&nbsp;the expiration of all payment obligations unless sooner terminated by the Company or Genzyme. The Company and Genzyme have customary termination rights including the right to terminate for an uncured material breach of the agreement committed by the other party and Genzyme has the right to terminate for convenience.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Accounting Analysis
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Collaboration Agreement includes the following deliverables: (i)&nbsp;research and development services for each of the Split Territory License Programs and the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Program, (ii)&nbsp;participation in the AJSC, (iii)&nbsp;participation in the DAC and (iv)&nbsp;the option to obtain a development and commercial license in the Parkinson&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	17
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage128"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Program and related deliverables. The Company has determined that the option to obtain a development and commercial license in the Parkinson&#x2019;s program is not a substantive option for accounting purposes, primarily because there is no additional option exercise payment payable by Genzyme at the time the option is exercised. Therefore, the option to obtain a license and other obligations of the Company that are contingent upon exercise of the option are considered deliverables at the inception of the arrangement. The options in the other Split Territory Programs and the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Program are considered substantive as there is substantial option exercise payments payable by Genzyme upon exercise. In addition, as a result of the uncertainties related to the discovery, research, development and commercialization activities, the Company is at risk with regard to whether Genzyme will exercise the options. Moreover, the substantive options are not priced at a significant incremental discount. Accordingly, the substantive options are not considered deliverables at the inception of the arrangement and the associated option exercise payments are not included in allocable arrangement consideration. The Company has also determined that any obligations which are contingent upon the exercise of a substantive option are not considered deliverables at the outset of the arrangement, as these deliverables are contingent upon the exercise of the options. In addition, any option exercise payments associated with the substantive options are not included in the allocable arrangement consideration.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has concluded that each of the deliverables identified at the inception of the arrangement has standalone value from the other undelivered elements. Additionally, the Collaboration Agreement does not include return rights related to the initial collaboration term. Accordingly, each deliverable qualifies as a separate unit of accounting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has identified $79.3&nbsp;million of allocable arrangement consideration consisting of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$65
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million upfront fee, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$5.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million premium paid in excess of fair value of the Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$9.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million of Genzyme &#x201C;in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;kind&#x201D; and other funding.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has allocated the allocable arrangement consideration based on the relative selling price of each unit of accounting. For all units of accounting, the Company determined the selling price using the best estimate of selling price (&#x201C;BESP&#x201D;). The Company determined the BESP for the service related deliverable for the research and development activities based on internal estimates of the costs to perform the services, including expected internal expenses and expenses with third parties for services and supplies, marked up to include a reasonable profit margin and adjusted for the scope of the potential license. Significant inputs used to determine the total expense of the research and development activities include, the length of time required and the number and costs of various studies that will be performed to complete the POP Study. The BESP for the AJSC and DAC have been estimated based on the costs incurred to participate in the committees, marked up to include a reasonable profit margin. The BESP for the license option was determined based on the estimated value of the license and related deliverables adjusted for the estimated probability that the option would be exercised by Genzyme.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">

</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	18

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Based on the relative selling price allocation, the allocable arrangement consideration was allocated as follows:
</FONT>

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company recognizes the amounts associated with research and development services on a straight line basis over the period of service as there is no discernable pattern or objective measure of performance for the services. Similarly, the Company recognizes the amount associated with the committee obligations on a straight line basis over the period of service consistent with the expected pattern of performance. The amounts allocated to the license option will be deferred until the option is exercised. The revenue recognition upon option exercise will be determined based on whether the license has standalone value from the remaining deliverables at the time of exercise.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has evaluated all of the milestones that may be received in connection with the Split Territory Licensed Product and the Spinal Muscular Atrophy Program Licensed Product. In evaluating if a milestone is substantive, the Company assesses whether: (i)&nbsp;the consideration is commensurate with either the Company&#x2019;s performance to achieve the milestone or the enhancement of the value of the delivered item(s) as a result of a specific outcome resulting from the Company performance to achieve the milestone, (ii)&nbsp;the consideration relates solely to past performance and (iii)&nbsp;the consideration is reasonable relative to all of the deliverables and payment terms within the arrangement. All regulatory milestones are considered substantive on the basis of the contingent nature of the milestone, specifically reviewing factors such as the scientific, clinical, regulatory, and other risks that must be overcome to achieve the milestone as well as the level of effort and investment required. Accordingly, such amounts will be recognized as revenue in full in the period in which the associated milestone is achieved, assuming all other revenue recognition criteria are met. All commercial milestones will be accounted for in the same manner as royalties and recorded as revenue upon achievement of the milestone, assuming all other revenue recognition criteria are met.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company recognized
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$ 17,334,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of revenue associated with its collaboration with Genzyme related to research and development services performed during the period. As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, there is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$ 54,982,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of deferred revenue related to the Collaboration Agreement, which is classified as either current or noncurrent in the accompanying balance sheet based on the period the services are expected to be delivered.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Costs incurred relating to the programs that Genzyme has the option to license under the Collaboration Agreement consist of internal and external research and development costs, which primarily include: salaries and benefits, lab supplies and preclinical research studies. The Company does not separately track or segregate the amount of costs incurred under the Collaboration Agreement. All of these costs are included in research and development expenses in the Company&#x2019;s statement of operations during the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. The Company estimates that the majority of research and development expense during the period relate to programs for which Genzyme has an option right.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	University of Massachusetts (&#x201C;UMass&#x201D;) and MassBiologics Collaboration
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In January 2014, U
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	M
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ass and the Company entered into a Collaboration Agreemen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	t wherein the Company granted UM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ass
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	23,529
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;shares of common stock, valued at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$12,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which was recorded as research and development expense. This was the only payment made under the Collaboration Agreement until it was amended by the Collaboration Agreement entered into with U
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	M
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ass and MassBiologics in October 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	On October&nbsp;20, 2014, the Company entered into a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Collaboration Agreement with UM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ass and MassBiologics (of the U
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	M
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ass Medical School).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Under the agreement, the Company shall (i)&nbsp;fund certain projects that will be conducted by U
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	M
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ass or MassBiologics, (ii)&nbsp;fund certain educational programs of U
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	M
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ass, including post
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;doctoral research at the Company&#x2019;s laboratories beginning in 2015, and (iii)&nbsp;collaborate with MassBiologics to establish scalable processes for manufacturing recombinant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	adeno
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;associated viral
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vector products using current good manufacturing practices.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In November 2014, the parties agreed to the first project under this agreement whereby the Company will fund approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,861,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	over a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	sixteen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	month period for certain research and development services performed by MassBiologics. The project commenced in January 2015. If the agreement is terminated for any reason, the Company is obligated to fund the remaining balance of the total price of all work completed and any other out of pocket costs incurred by MassBiologics on behalf of the Company. As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company had provided cumulative funding of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$376,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1,867,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	respectively, which exceeded costs incurred by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$376,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. The amount funded in excess of costs incurred is recorded in prepaid expenses as of the balance sheet at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and recorded in accrued expenses for the amounts due at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Research and development costs incurred by MassBiologics under the project agreement will be expensed by the Company as incurred.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Other Agreements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During 2015 and 2014, the Company entered into various agreements with contract research organizations and institutions to license intellectual property. In consideration for the licensed rights the Company generally made upfront payments, which were recorded as research and development expense as the acquired technologies were considered in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;process research and development. During the years ended December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015 and 2014, the Company paid $75,000 and $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	830,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively, in up
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;front license fees. The license agreements also obligate the Company to make additional payments that are contingent upon specific clinical trial and regulatory approval milestones being achieved as well as royalties on future product sales. The agreements to license intellectual property include potential milestone payments that are dependent upon the development of products licensed under the agreements and contingent upon the achievement of clinical trial or regulatory approval milestones. The maximum aggregate potential milestone payments payable by the Company total approximately $12.0&nbsp;million. Additionally, under the terms of one agreement, the Company has options to license intellectual property to be used in the development of therapies for four additional disease indications. If the Company exercises all of the options under the agreement, it would be obligated to pay aggregate up
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;front fees of up to approximately $1.5&nbsp;million and milestone payments that are contingent upon clinical trial results and regulatory approval of $5.0&nbsp;million per disease indication, or up to $20.0&nbsp;million in total. As of December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015 and 2014, there have been no milestones achieved. The Company can generally terminate the license agreements upon 30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;90&nbsp;days prior written notice.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Additionally, certain license agreements require the Company to reimburse the licensor for certain past and ongoing patent related expenses. During the year ended December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015 and 2014, the Company incurred $295,000 and $872,000 of expense, respectively, related to these reimbursable patent costs which are recorded as general and administrative expense.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Litigation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company is not a party to any litigation and does
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	have contingency reserves established for any litigation liabilities as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8. Redeemable Convertible Preferred Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In November 2015, upon the closing of the Company&#x2019;s IPO, all issued and outstanding redeemable convertible preferred stock was automatically converted into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	17,647,054
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of common stock, see Note 2.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has newly authorized preferred stock amounting to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The newly authorized preferred stock was classified under stockholders&#x2019; equity (deficit)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	at December 31, 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage131"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s redeemable convertible preferred stock (&#x201C;Preferred Stock&#x201D;) has been classified as temporary equity on the accompanying balance sheets instead of in stockholders&#x2019; deficit in accordance with authoritative guidance for the classification and measurement of redeemable securities as the redeemable convertible preferred stock is redeemable at the option of the holder after the redemption date, February 2021.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	45,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during 2014 and 2015.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	These shares were issued at various closings in 2014 and 2015 for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share. The shares were issued in exchange for cash proceeds of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$42,039,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, net of issuance costs of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$32,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and the exchange of outstanding redeemable Convertible Notes, including accrued interest, of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,929,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Tranche Rights Issued with Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Included in the terms of the January 2014 Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock Purchase Agreement were certain rights (&#x201C;Tranche Rights&#x201D;) granted to the investors of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock purchased in January 2014, including the holders of the redeemable Convertible Notes who exchanged the redeemable Convertible Notes. The Tranche Rights obligated the investors in Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock to purchase and the Company to sell an additional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	18,500,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share contingent upon successful near term in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;licensing and progress on initial experiments and research and development planning (&#x201C;Tranche Right I&#x201D;). In addition, the investors are obligated to purchase and the Company is obligated to sell an additional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	20,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock upon the development of project engine and achievement of certain clinical milestones (&#x201C;Tranche Right&nbsp;II&#x201D;). In addition, the Tranche Rights allowed the investors the ability to purchase the additional shares at their option at any time. The Tranche Rights were transferrable by the investors, subject to approval by the Board.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has concluded the Tranche Rights meet the definition of a freestanding financial instrument, as the Tranche Rights are legally detachable and separately exercisable from the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock. Therefore, the Company has allocated the proceeds between the Tranche Rights and the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock. As the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock is redeemable at the holder&#x2019;s option, the Tranche Rights are classified as an asset or liability and are initially recorded at fair value. The Tranche Rights are measured at fair value at each reporting period. Since the Tranche Rights are subject to fair value accounting, the Company allocated the proceeds to the Tranche Rights based on the fair value at the date of issuance with the remaining proceeds being allocated to the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock. The estimated fair value of the Tranche Rights was determined using a probability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;weighted present value model that considers the probability of closing a tranche, the estimated future value of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock each closing, and the investment required at each closing. Future values are converted to present value using a discount rate appropriate for probability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;adjusted cash flows.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The following table summarizes the initial value of the Tranche Rights included in the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock Purchase Agreement (in thousands):
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_25"></A>

<DIV STYLE="FLOAT:LEFT">
</DIV>
	1,495
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.42%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:81.24%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Tranche Right II
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.68%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.74%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="FLOAT:LEFT">
</DIV>
	(4,095)
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.42%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PADDING:0PT;">

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:81.24%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

	Total value of Tranche Rights
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.68%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.74%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:2PT DOUBLE #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

	$
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:12.94%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:2PT DOUBLE #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">

	(2,600)
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.42%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;PADDING:0PT;">

</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Tranche Right I was initially recorded as an asset of $1,495,000 as the purchase price of the additional shares was greater than the estimated value of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock at the expected settlement date. The Company issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	18,500,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	additional shares under Tranche Right I, in three separate closings during the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014 with total proceeds of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$18,491,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, net of issuance costs. Prior to each closing, any change in the value of Tranche Right I was recorded as other financing expense. The fair value of the portion of the Tranche Right I settled at each closing was reclassified to Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock. The Company recognized income of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$261,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	related to the mark to market of Tranche Right I during the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014, which is included in other financing expense.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	21
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage132"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Tranche Right II was initially recorded as a liability of $4,095,000 as the purchase price of the additional shares was less than the estimated price of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock at the expected settlement date. The Company recognized expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2,210,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	related to the mark to market of Tranche Right II during the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2014, which is included in other financing expense.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In February 2015, Tranche Right II was settled when the Company closed the final issuance of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock. The Company recognized expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$9,750,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	related to the mark to market of Tranche Right II during the period ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, which is included in other financing expense. The fair value of the Tranche Right II settled at closing was reclassified to Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock. The initial carrying amount of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock issued upon the closing of Tranche Right II amounted to approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$36,054,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	which exceeds the redemption value, therefore the carrying value is not being subsequently adjusted. However, the Company has reflected accrued dividends of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1,245,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	related
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to this issuance in the net loss attributable to common shareholders for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	30,000,001
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Series&nbsp;B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Preferred Stock were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	during 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. These shares were issued for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$3.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share. This issuance resulted in cash proceeds of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$89,780,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, net of issuance costs of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$220,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. Additionally, a discount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$5,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was recorded against the proceeds as the amount paid by Genzyme was in excess of fair value of the Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock at issuance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Preferred Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The rights, preferences, and privileges of the Preferred Stock are listed below:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Conversion
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Shares of Preferred Stock are convertible at any time at the option of the holder into such number of shares as is determined by dividing the original issuance price by the conversion price in effect at the time.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Immediately prior to the IPO,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the conversion price was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$4.25
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$12.75
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock, subject to adjustments to reflect the issuance of Common Stock, options, warrants, or other rights to subscribe for or to purchase Common Stock for a consideration per share, less than the conversion price then in effect and subsequent stock dividends and stock splits. In addition any reorganization, recapitalization, reclassification, consolidation or merger in which common stock is exchanged for securities, cash or other property.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	All outstanding shares of Preferred Stock are automatically converted upon the completion of either an IPO resulting in gross proceeds to the Company of at least
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$50.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million or the vote or written consent of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	67%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the then outstanding shares of preferred stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Dividends
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Holders of Preferred Stock are entitled to receive, before any cash is paid out or set aside for any Common Stock, cash dividends at a rate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	8%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the original purchase price per share annually (the &#x201C;Accruing Dividends&#x201D;). The dividends accrue cumulatively on a daily basis and are payable only when, and if, declared by the Board of Directors or upon liquidation or redemption.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In addition, the holders of Preferred Stock are entitled to additional dividends based on dividends declared to common stockholders, thereby giving the preferred stockholders the right to participate in undistributed earnings of the Company above the stated per share dividend rate. The preferred stockholders do not have a contractual obligation to share in the losses of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Redemption
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Preferred Stock is redeemable at the option of the holder after the redemption date of February 2021. The redemption value of the Preferred Stock is equal to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$3.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share for Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$1.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share for Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock plus any accrued but unpaid dividends. Accordingly, the Preferred Stock is being accreted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	22
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage133"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	redemption value through its redemption date, including accruals for cumulative dividend rights. If the initial carrying value exceeds the redemption value the carrying value is not adjusted.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Liquidation Preference
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Holders of Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock and Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock have preference to the assets of the Company in the event of any voluntary or involuntary liquidation, dissolution or winding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;up of the Company, equal to $3.00 per share for Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock and $1.00 per share for Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock, plus any accrued but unpaid dividends, whether or not declared, plus any dividends declared but unpaid thereon, on a pari passu basis. After the payment of the preference amounts to the holders of Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock and Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock, the remaining assets of the Company are to be distributed among the holders of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and holders of Common Stock on a pro rata basis. However, if the aggregate amount which the holders of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock would be entitled to receive exceeds
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$2.50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share (subject to appropriate adjustment in the event of any stock dividend, stock split, combination, reclassification or other similar event) (the &#x201C;Maximum Participant Amount&#x201D;), each holder of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock will receive the greater of the Maximum Participant Amount or the amount such holder would have received if all shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock had been converted into Common Stock immediately prior to such liquidation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Voting Rights
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Holders of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock are entitled to vote as a single class with the holders of Common Stock on all matters submitted for vote to the Stockholders of the Company. The holders of Preferred Stock are entitled to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vote for each equivalent common share on an as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;converted basis. In addition, the holders of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock are entitled to elect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;(2) directors. The remaining directors shall be elected by the holders of Common Stock voting together with the holders of the Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock as one class on an as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;converted basis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The holders of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock have certain protective rights as defined. These protective rights require the Required Vote before action can be taken to (i)&nbsp;increase or decrease the number of shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock or Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock that the Company has authority to issue, (ii)&nbsp;change the par value of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock or Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock, (iii)&nbsp;amend the Certificate of Incorporation in any way that adversely affects the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock or Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9. Common Stock
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company had authorized
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	120,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	65,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	hares of Common Stock, respectively at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$0.001
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	par value per share.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	General
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The voting, dividend and liquidation rights of the holders of the Common Stock are subject to and qualified by the rights, powers and preferences of the holders of Preferred Stock. The Common Stock has the following characteristics:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Voting
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The holders of shares of Common Stock are entitled to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vote for each share of Common Stock held at all meetings of stockholders and written actions in lieu of meetings.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Dividends
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The holders of shares of Common Stock are entitled to receive dividends, if and when declared by the Board of Directors. Cash dividends may not be declared or paid to holders of shares of Common Stock until all accrued unpaid dividends on Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock have been paid in accordance with their terms.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	No
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	dividends have been declared or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	by the Company since its inception.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	23
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage134"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Liquidation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	After payment to of their respective liquidation preferences to the holders of shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and Series&nbsp;B Preferred Stock, the holders of shares of Common Stock are entitled to share ratably in the Company&#x2019;s remaining assets available for distribution to its stockholders in the event of any voluntary or involuntary liquidation, dissolution or winding up of the Company or upon occurrence of a deemed liquidation event.
</FONT>
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
