<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 1PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	10. Stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#8209;Based Compensation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	2015 Stock Option Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	In October 2015, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	s board of directors and stockholders
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	approved the 2015 Stock Option and Incentive Plan, or 2015 Stock Option Plan, which became effective upon the completion of the IPO. The 2015 Stock Option Plan provides the Company with the flexibility to use various equity-based incentive and other awards as compensation tools to motivate our workforce.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	These tools include stock options, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock, restricted stock units, unrestricted stock, performance share awards and cash-based awards.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	The 2015 Stock Option Plan replaced the 2014 Plan. Any options or awards outstanding under the 2014 Stock Option Plan remained outstanding and effective. The number of shares initially reserved for issuance under the 2015 Stock Option Plan is the sum of (i)&nbsp;1,311,812 shares of common stock and (ii)&nbsp;the number of shares under the 2014 Plan that are not needed to fulfill the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	s obligations for awards issued under the 2014 Plan as a result of forfeiture, expiration, cancellation, termination or net issuances of awards thereunder. The number of shares of common stock that may be issued under the 2015 Stock Option Plan is also subject to increase on the first day of each fiscal year by up to 4% of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	s issued and outstanding shares of common stock on the immediately preceding December&nbsp;31.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	960,275
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock options to employees and directors and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	69,793
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock options to non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;employees. As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, there were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1,620,479
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares available for future issuance under the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	2014 Stock Option and Grant Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In January 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company adopted the Voyager Therapeutics,&nbsp;Inc. 2014 Stock Option and Grant Plan (the &#x201C;2014 Plan&#x201D;), under which it may grant incentive stock options, non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;qualified stock options, restricted stock awards, unrestricted stock awards, or restricted stock units to purchase up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	823,529
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Common Stock to employees, officers, directors and consultants of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In April 2014, the Company amended the Plan to allow for the issuance of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1,411,764
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Common Stock. In August 2014, April&nbsp;2015, August 2015 and October 2015 the Company further amended the Plan to allow for the issuance of up to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2,000,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2,047,058
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2,669,411
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2,998,823
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Common Stock, respectively. During 2014 the Company issued only restricted stock awards under the Plan and during 2015 the Company only granted stock options.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The terms of stock awards agreements, including vesting requirements, are determined by the Board of Directors and are subject to the provisions of the 2014 Plan. Restricted Stock awards granted by the Company generally vest based on each grantee&#x2019;s continued service with the Company during a specified period following grant. Awards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	F-

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage135"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	granted to employees generally vest over
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years, with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	25%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vesting on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year anniversary and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	75%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	vesting ratably, on a monthly basis, over the remaining
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years. Awards granted to non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;employee consultants generally vest monthly over a period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	During the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company granted a total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1,597,988
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of restricted stock to employees and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	110,960
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of restricted stock to non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;employee consultants at an original issuance price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$0.04
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Founder Awards
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In January 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	the Company issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1,188,233
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of restricted stock to its Founders at an original issuance price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$0.0425
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	per share. Of the total restricted shares awarded to the Founders,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	835,292
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares generally vest over
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	four
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	years, based on each Founder&#x2019;s continued service to the Company in varying capacity as a Scientific Advisory Board member, consultant, director, officer or employee, as set forth in each grantee&#x2019;s individual restricted stock purchase agreement. The remaining
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	352,941
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the shares issued will begin vesting upon the achievement of certain performance objectives as well as continued service to the Company, as set forth in the agreements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	These performance conditions are tied to certain milestone events specific to the Company&#x2019;s corporate goals, including but not limited to preclinical and clinical development milestones related to the Company&#x2019;s product candidates. Stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;based compensation expense associated with these performance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;based awards will be recognized when the achievement of the performance condition is considered probable, using management&#x2019;s best estimates. As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, management has concluded that achievement of such performance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;based milestones was not probable. Accordingly,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;based compensation expense was recorded as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	related to these awards.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	2015 Employee Stock Purchase Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	262,362
</FONT>

	Restricted Stock

	Using the Black

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;Scholes option pricing model, the weighted average fair value of options granted to employees and directors during the year ended December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015 w

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	as $5.68. T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	he expense related to awards granted to employees and directors was

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$720,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the year ended December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015. There were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock options granted during the year ended December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2014 or the period ended December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2013.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Using the Black
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;Scholes option pricin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	g model, the weighted average
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	grant date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	fair value of options granted to non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;employees during the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	was $7.95. Unvested o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ptions granted to non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;employees are revalued at each measurement period until they vest. The expen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	se related to awar
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ds granted to non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;employees was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$301,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. There were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	stock options granted during the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The fair value of each option issued to non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;employees was estimated at each vesting and reporting date using the Black
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;Scholes option pricing model.&nbsp;&nbsp;The reporting date fair value was determined

	using the

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company had unrecognized stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;based compensation expense related to its unvested stock option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	s of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$4,753,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	which is expe
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	cted to be recognized over the remaining weighted average vesting period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.36
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	401(k) Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has a defined
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#8209;contribution savings plan under Section&nbsp;401(k) of the Internal Revenue Code (the &#x201C;401(k) Plan&#x201D;). The 401(k) Plan covers all employees who meet defined minimum age and service requirements, and allows participants to defer a portion of their annual compensation on a pretax basis. As currently established, the Company is not required to make and has not made any contributions to the 401(k) Plan to date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	12. Income Taxes
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	A &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	reconciliation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	of the U.S. federal statutory tax rate to the Company&#x2019;s effective tax rate is as follows:
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Under the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code, certain substantial changes in the Company&#x2019;s ownership may result in a limitation on the amount of NOL carryforwards and research and development credit carryforwards that may be utilized annually to offset future taxable income and taxes payable. The Company has not completed a formal analysis under Section 382 of the Internal Revenue Code and therefore, has not determined whether a limitation has occurred. The Company will complete a full analysis of our tax attribute carryforwards prior to any utilization.
</FONT>
</P>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company recognizes deferred tax assets and liabilities for the expected future tax consequences of events that have been recognized in the Company&#x2019;s financial statements or tax returns. Under this method, deferred tax assets and liabilities are determined based on differences between the financial statement carrying amounts and the tax bases of the assets and liabilities using the enacted tax rates in effect in the years in which the differences are expected to reverse. A valuation allowance against deferred tax assets is recorded if, based on the weight of the available evidence, it is more likely than not that some or all of the deferred tax assets will not be realized.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In November 2015, the Financial Standards Board (&#x201C;FASB&#x201D;) issued Accounting Standards Update (ASU) No. 2015-17,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Balance Sheet Classification of Deferred Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	. ASU 2015-17 simplifies the presentation of deferred income taxes by eliminating the requirement for entities to separate deferred tax assets and liabilities into current and non-current amounts in the balance sheet. Rather, it requires that deferred tax assets and liabilities are classified as non-current in the balance sheet. The Company adopted this standard prospectively for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and prior periods were not retrospectively adjusted.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Management has evaluated the positive and negative evidence bearing upon the realizability of its deferred tax assets, which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	principally comprise
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	d of NOL carryforwards and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	research and development credit carryforwards. Management has determined that it is more likely than not that the Company will not recognize the benefits of its federal and state deferred tax assets, and as a result, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	valuation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	allowance of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	15.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	7.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	has been established at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, respectively. The change in valuation allowance was $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	7.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	for the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, principally due to additional federal and state operating losses.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company has not yet conducted a study of its research and development credit carryforwards. This study may result in an adjustment to the Company&#x2019;s research and development credit carryforwards; however, until a study is completed and any adjustment is known, no amounts are being presented as an uncertain tax position. A full valuation allowance has been provided against the Company&#x2019;s research and development credits, and if an adjustment is required, this adjustment would be offset by an adjustment to the valuation allowance. Thus, there would be no impact to the balance sheets or statements of operations if an adjustment were required.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Company applies ASC 740 related to accounting for uncertainty in income taxes. At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	unrecognized tax benefits.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Interest and penalty charges, if any, related to unrecognized tax benefits would be classified as income tax expense in the accompanying statements of operations. Since the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	28

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<A HREF="#VYGR-20151231X10K_HTM_TOC">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	has incurred operating losses since inception,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	it is generally subject to examination by the U.S. federal, state, and local income tax authorities for all tax years in which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	a loss carryforward is available. The Company did not have any international operations as of December 31, 2015. There are currently no federal or state audits in process.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	. Related
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Since inception, the Company received consulting and management services from one of its investors. In January 2014, the Company issued
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	470,589
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;shares of common stock as partial compensation for these services. The fair value of the shares was approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$238,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The total amount of consulting and management services provided by this investor was approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	122,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1,280,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	and $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2,379,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	uring the years ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, and the period ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	respectively. As of

	December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, the Company included approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	$7,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	in accounts payable related to service fees charged by this investor.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 10PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:07.68%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">
<DIV STYLE="FLOAT:LEFT">
</DIV>
	(9.14)
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	SIGNATURES AND POWER OF ATTORNEY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We, the undersigned directors and officers of Voyager Therapeutics,&nbsp;Inc. (the "Company"), hereby severally constitute and appoint Steven Paul, M.D. and J.&nbsp;Jeffrey Goater, and each of them singly, our true and lawful attorneys, with full power to them, and to each of them singly, to sign for us and in our names in the capacities indicated below, any and all amendments to this Annual Report on Form 10-K, and to file or cause to be filed the same, with all exhibits thereto and other documents in connection therewith, with the Securities and Exchange Commission, granting unto said attorneys, and each of them, full power and authority to do and perform each and every act and thing requisite and necessary to be done in connection therewith, as fully to all intents and purposes as each of us might or could do in person, and hereby ratifying and confirming all that said attorneys, and each of them, or their substitute or substitutes, shall do or cause to be done by virtue of this Power of Attorney.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 8PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, this Annual Report on Form 10-K has been signed by the following persons in the capacities and on the dates indicated.
</FONT>
</P>

</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	c.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

	4.

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>

</TD>

	Exhibit&nbsp;32.1

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	SECTION&nbsp;906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In connection with the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Annual R
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	eport on Form&nbsp;10-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	K
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Voyager
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Therapeutics, Inc. (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;) for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	December 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#x201C;Report&#x201D;),&nbsp;each of the undersigned officers hereby certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	that to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the best of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	his or her knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
